meanings.sent1: She mingles the colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: During the party, everyone mingles and chats with each other.
meanings.sent3: The paintbrush mingles the blue and yellow to make green.
meanings.sent4: In the recipe, the flavors mingle to form a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The music mingles with the sounds of nature, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: He mingles with his classmates during lunch break.
meanings.sent2: At the event, people mingles and make new friends.
meanings.sent3: The shy puppy mingles with other dogs at the park.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter mingles with the joyful chatter of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies mingles with the air, inviting everyone in.

meanings.sent1: The flavors of the spices mingles perfectly in the dish.
meanings.sent2: In the painting, the colors mingles seamlessly to form a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent3: The scents of the flowers mingles in the garden, creating a lovely fragrance.
meanings.sent4: As the rivers mingles, they form a larger, more powerful stream.
meanings.sent5: The voices of the choir mingles harmoniously, creating a mesmerizing melody.
